content.rendered:
Communication hub for connecting Water Dispensers via LoRa / GSM

Features:

  • LoRa WAN and 3G cellular radio hub to provide remote monitoring and management to water dispenser networks
  • Plug and play setup
  • Connect up to 20 water dispensers per hub
  • 2 way communication via LoRa network built into Water Dispensers
  • Cellular interface to LORENTZ Global management system
  • In built battery charger
  • Remote management and configuration
